name: STMT_EB_DETAIL
description: This table contains Enterprise Billing information about your statement print and detail bill records.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement print or detail bill record.

columns.name: PREV_PAT_BAL
columns.description: The enterprise billing outstanding self-pay balance for the guarantor from the previous statement.

columns.name: PREV_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The enterprise billing amount due for the guarantor from the previous statement. It is a combination of the payment plan amount due plus any outstanding balances not on a payment plan.

columns.name: NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The enterprise billing new charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The enterprise billing new payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The enterprise billing new adjustment amount.

columns.name: TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The enterprise billing total charge amount.

columns.name: TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The enterprise billing total payment amount.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The enterprise billing total adjustment amount.

columns.name: CURR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: The enterprise billing outstanding self-pay balance for the guarantor.

columns.name: CURR_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The enterprise billing amount due for the guarantor. It is a combination of the payment plan amount due plus any outstanding balances not on a payment plan.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_CYCLE_LEVEL
columns.description: The enterprise billing follow-up cycle level for this statement.

columns.name: IS_INFORMATIONAL_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not this is informational (meaning the amount due is zero).

columns.name: PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: The enterprise billing previous insurance balance.

columns.name: NEW_INS_CHGS
columns.description: The enterprise billing new insurance charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_INS_PMTS
columns.description: The enterprise billing new insurance payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_INS_ADJS
columns.description: The enterprise billing new insurance adjustment amount.

columns.name: CURR_INS_BAL
columns.description: The enterprise billing current insurance balance.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_CHGS
columns.description: The enterprise billing new patient charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_PMTS
columns.description: The enterprise billing new patient payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_ADJS
columns.description: The enterprise billing new patient adjustment amount.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_TOT
columns.description: Total amount of payment plan.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_BAL
columns.description: Total amount of enterprise payment plan balance.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DUE
columns.description: Amount due per period of the payment plan.

columns.name: SP_FOLLOW_UP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The guarantor self-pay follow-up level.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_MONTH_AMT
columns.description: The monthly amount of enterprise payment plan.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The total patient payments for a guarantor.

columns.name: TOT_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total patient adjustments for a guarantor.

columns.name: TOT_INS_PMT_ADJ
columns.description: The total insurance payments for a guarantor.

columns.name: TOT_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total insurance adjustments for a guarantor.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_OVERDUE_AMT
columns.description: The overdue amount on the payment plan.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_CARD_ID
columns.description: The payment method that is used for guarantor's Auto Pay.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_DATE
columns.description: Date to charge the payment method for this specific statement if its guarantor is on Auto Pay.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_NXT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The amount that the system calculates as the next payment amount. This amount is based on the current scheduled payment plus the next monthly due amount. It also takes into account the system definition settings regarding whether auto pay should collect overdue amounts or be reduced by other patient payments. This amount will be charged to the payment method for this specific statement if its guarantor is on Auto Pay.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_PAID_AHEAD_AMT
columns.description: The paid ahead amount on the payment plan.

columns.name: TOT_CONTESTED_BAL
columns.description: The total contested balance for the guarantor.

columns.name: PROP_PMT_PLAN_MONTH_AMT
columns.description: If the guarantor can sign up for a payment plan, then this is the proposed monthly amount that will be shown if they were to sign up in MyChart.

columns.name: PROP_PMT_PLAN_NUM_PMTS
columns.description: If the guarantor can sign up for a payment plan, then this is the proposed number of payments that will be shown if they were to sign up in MyChart.

columns.name: TOT_SCHED_PMTS
columns.description: The total scheduled payments on the statement.

columns.name: PAY_NOW_AMT
columns.description: The amount the patient should pay now. This is calculated by subtracting scheduled payments from the statement due amount.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_LN
columns.description: The payment plan line on the guarantor. This gives additional details about the payment plan.

columns.name: IS_AUTOPAY_SUSPENDED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the Auto Pay is currently suspended for the payment plan.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_DECLINE_DATE
columns.description: The date Auto Pay was suspended because of a declined payment.

columns.name: STMT_DUE_DATE
columns.description: The due date of the statement.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_TRACKER_SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payment plan expected payment tracker record when the statement was generated.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DEFER_MONTHS
columns.description: The number of months that the payment plan was deferred when the statement was generated.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_HARS_BAL_NOT_ON_PLAN
columns.description: The total balance not on a payment plan for the hospital accounts that are on the payment plan that generated this statement.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_INITIAL_EST_BAL
columns.description: The initial balance of all the pre-service estimates on the payment plan that generated this statement.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_REMAINING_EST_BAL
columns.description: The remaining balance of all the pre-service estimates on the payment plan that generated this statement.
